function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Long queue at the beginning of the day in the inoculation phase","Impact":"Delays in vaccination process, increased risk of crowding and transmission of contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Implement dynamic shift between doctors and nurses to balance workload","Technologies":"Resource management software for scheduling and allocation","People":"Patients, medical staff","Owner":"Hospital management"},{"Description":"Increased flow of patients leading to crowded moments","Impact":"Higher risk of disease transmission due to close contact and crowding","Mitigation":"Implement staggered appointment scheduling to manage patient flow","Technologies":"Appointment scheduling software, queue management systems","People":"Patients, medical staff","Owner":"Hospital management"},{"Description":"High utilization of doctors in the anamnesis control phase","Impact":"Overburdening of doctors, potential decrease in quality of care, increased risk of disease transmission due to prolonged interactions","Mitigation":"Implement dynamic shift between doctors and nurses to balance workload","Technologies":"Resource management software for scheduling and allocation","People":"Patients, medical staff","Owner":"Hospital management"}]}
